content.query:
CREATE DATABASE SalesDB COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8

USE SalesDB

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE csv
WITH (
    LOCATION='https://pssynapselake.dfs.core.windows.net/files/testdata/'
)

-- Easier to query now
SELECT 
    cust.filepath() as path,
    cust.filename() as name
FROM OPENROWSET (
    BULK 'c*.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'csv',
    FORMAT = 'csv',
    HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
    PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
) as cust
